Articles.Content:
Angel Space Program

Hello y'all. My name is Jason and I felt I finally wanted to start sharing some of my work with the community. I have been playing KSP for about a year now and feel like I have a good grasp on the basics and can be considered an average player at the game. A lot of my inspiration comes from this section of the message board so I figured this was a good place to start posting. It's cool to see how other people go about running their space programs. This is my first post of what I hope to be many posts as I work on my space program. I play in Science Mode (with quite a few parts mods & MechJeb), Career is still a bit meh to me. Science mode to me gives a good progression feel to the game. I do wish there was Kerbal progression though like in Career mode.

I hope to eventually add videos and learn how to actually use the image posting commands so I can make things a bit cleaner on the thread.

I have already done quite a bit of science grinding to get to where I can actually start building the meat of what I want to accomplish. This is the start of my Minmus Space Station. I just put the station core into a 100m orbit around Minmus. Next will be a space tug, return vehicle, and a main truss system for adding additional modules. All feedback is welcome for anybody who has any input, like I mentioned earlier I still consider myself an average player at best.

Edit 10/14/15: Been busy with school. Finally got some time to play again over the last few days and just playing with the OP format some.

Edited October 14, 2015 by Noobk
Nice, looking forward to see your work!
